alert.note: Alert for Clay; Laurel (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 18 at 6:57PM EDT until May 18 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Laurel County in south central Kentucky... West central Clay County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 656 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bernstadt, or 8 miles west of London, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bernstadt around 700 PM EDT. London around 705 PM EDT. Sublimity City around 710 PM EDT. Levi Jackson S.P. around 715 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lida and Cane Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
